signed: Signed and dated in pencil, LR: James Rosenquist 1969-70
text: Smokestack discharge is the unusual subject of James Rosenquist's imaginative interpretation of industrial might. For Rosenquist, brilliant contrasting color and the print's symmetrical composition take precedence over the factory-related imagery.
title: Night Smoke
